com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util
Class WizardProjectHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util.WizardProjectHelper

public class WizardProjectHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Supplies the wizard with methods to build pluginprojects and necessary files for the Furcas Workbench, Works together with the classes CreateProject and SourceCodeFactory in the wizards package.

Method Detail

createPlugInProject

public static IProject createPlugInProject(ProjectInfo pi,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> srcFolders,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> nonSrcFolders,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> exportedPackages,
                                           IProgressMonitor progressMonitor,
                                           Shell theShell,
                                           boolean metamodel)
Generates a fresh plugin project for eclipse.

Parameters:
pi - The user input from the wizard.
srcFolders - List of all src folders
nonSrcFolders - List of all non source folders
exportedPackages - List of all exported packages
progressMonitor - The ProgressMonitor
theShell - The Window containing the wizard.
metamodel - States wether this is the metamodel project or not. This is used for including different natures and builders and a different project name.
Returns:
The generated project.

The file.

createGenmodel

public static IFile createGenmodel(IProgressMonitor progressMonitor,
                                   IProject project,
                                   ProjectInfo pi)
                            throws CoreException
Creates a .genmodel file for the ecore metamodel. See CreateMMProject.

Parameters:
progressMonitor - The progress monitor
project - the project where the genmodel is to be created
pi - The user input
Returns:
The .genmodel file
Throws:
CoreException
